title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, February 18, 2020
description: Today is the birthday of Sholem Aleichem (1895), known as the Mark Twain of Yiddish literature. He said, “No matter how bad things get, you got to go on living, even if it kills you.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
